item.title: Github Page
item.description: Publish a personal webpage using Github Page! intro Normally, people cannot access your website if it is in localhost. By uisng Github Page, you can publich your own webpage (ie: blog). We use Hugo, which is a very popular building website framework, to build our website. build website Hugo is very simple, just considering it as PHP rewritten by Golang.
